value: Maison de MÃ©dard Aribot or Maison du bagnard on the morne Larcher.

Anse Cafard Memorial or Cap 110 : monument in remembrance of a crash of a ship bringing slaves and all the victims of the slave trade. The statues are facing the orientated towards 110 degrees which is Africa.
The very long beach bordered by a forest.
Scuba dive at the diamond rock.
The far right part of the beach has some good waves when the swell is coming from the south. Popular with bodyboarders. Be careful with currents.
